backend/main.mo: Defines publication controls, access checks, user profile types, and lesson/assignment domain models with admin-gated publish/unpublish methods.
feature_evidence.json: Reports evidence for a feature that publishes the app using admin-only backend methods and lists related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all main frontend files describing their behavior, props, and logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color tokens, light/dark theme variables, and global styling.
frontend/index.html: PWA-enabled HTML shell providing meta tags, manifest links, and the root mount point.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, display mode, and startup configuration.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker implementing versioned caching, network-first navigation, and offline fallbacks.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring router, queries, and publication gating with identity/profile loading logic and global UI components.
frontend/src/components/ActorNotReadySta: Displays a network-initialization state with retry support when the backend actor is not ready.
frontend/src/components/AdminPublication: Admin-only UI for publishing or unpublishing the app with reason input and status display.
frontend/src/components/AssignmentsTab.t: Displays student assignments and provides dialogs for submitting, grading, and assigning lessons.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: Catches unhandled errors and shows a recovery UI with reload and data-clear options.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with app branding, theme toggle, authentication controls, and offline indicator.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Handles PWA install prompts for web and iOS, showing a dismissible install card.
frontend/src/components/LessonPlansTab.t: Manages viewing and creating lesson plans, including custom, library-based, uploaded, and AI-generated lessons.
frontend/src/components/OfflineIndicator: Shows temporary online/offline alerts based on PWA connectivity status.
A multi-step onboarding dialog explaining features, subjects, and premium pricing, with localStorage tracking for completion.
frontend/src/components/PremiumBanner.ts: Displays a premium upsell alert when the user lacks premium access and provides an upgrade button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Profile setup form allowing users to set name and role, with role auto-selected based on sign-in type and saved via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProgressTab.tsx: Shows assignment completion, average grades, and subject progress for a student using fetched assignment data.
Reusable error UI component showing an alert with a retry option.
frontend/src/components/ReportCardsTab.t: Manages viewing, generating, and purchasing access to report cards, including upgrade and cancellation flows.
frontend/src/components/RoleSignInButton: Sign-in buttons allowing users to select educator/parent or student roles, storing the choice and handling login flows.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard showing lesson plans, assignments, progress, and reports with onboarding and premium prompts.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page that loads preview content, handles auth redirect, and displays feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentCancel.tsx: Displays cancellation notice when a payment fails and offers navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Shows successful payment confirmation, refreshes premium status, and links back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/Takedown.tsx: Maintenance page explaining temporary unavailability with optional reason and admin controls.
frontend/src/utils/authorizationErrors.t: Classifies backend authorization errors and returns standardized user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/clearAppData.ts: Clears specific app-related local and session storage keys to reset corrupted client state.
frontend/src/utils/lessonUpload.ts: Helpers for validating lesson file types, deriving titles, reading text files, and handling errors.
frontend/src/utils/signInType.ts: Stores and retrieves pre-login sign-in type using sessionStorage with legacy key support.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across query and hash routing.
frontend/src/utils/userFacingErrors.ts: Maps technical error messages to friendly text, providing specific handling for actor readiness, auth, network, trap, and authorization issues.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines project state metadata, including versioning, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature requirements for the app.
